title: Captured Fate
description: Is this captivity... or a second chance?My men and I lost our bid for freedom. But nothing in our new prison is quite what I expected.That doesn't mean I'm going to stop fighting. I just have to make sure I pick the right battles. Especially when it isn't just our lives but those of the kids who came after us on the line.If I'm going to be more than a monster, I need to figure out who the real monsters areâ€”and take back everything they've stolen from us before it's too late.
author: Eva Chase
